name: Sproutland - Milestone 2
description:
This is my progress on my Milestone 2 for the Game Programming 2 project. In this milestone, I have implemented basic AI, GameMode, GameState, and a PlayerController. I've changed some character interaction and made the friendly NPCs follow the player and offer advice through the HUD. I've added a death state and widget screen that pops up for that. 

The outline for the level is still rough, but hopefully I will be able to implement more detail and interaction with this level.

Controls: 

W -> Move forward

D -> Move backward

Mouse -> look to go in the direction you want

Spacebar -> Jump

E-> Interact with objects
